thread.title: 69 cars left in Poole as passengers blockade boat
thread.title_full: 69 cars left in Poole as passengers blockade boat | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: 69 cars left in Poole as passengers blockade boat
text:
Police at the scene in Poole Credit: Tim Butler Sixty-nine vehicles - and their passengers - were left in Poole this morning as a blockade of the Condor Liberation meant they could not board the boat.
The rising tide meant the Harbour Master had to sail before the vessel was fully loaded.
Tensions at the port were high as 70 passengers were told this morning that a 'systems error' had meant that the boat was overbooked.
A small number were said to have prevented others from boarding, and Dorset Police were called to calm the chaos.
Passengers took to social media to vent their anger after three days of disruption .
?Kean @whyknm Follow @ itvchanneltv @ condor_ferries Getting to UNI seems a challenge atm.Bring back the old boats! Least there was an insurance plan if one failed
